channel.title: Pre-Requisite on AWS HPC Workshops
channel.description: Recent content in Pre-Requisite on AWS HPC Workshops

item.title: a. Pre-Requisites
item.description: The following requirements will be necessary to follow this guide. A laptop with an internet connection running Microsoft Windows, Mac OS X, or Linux. An Internet browser such as Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Opera or Edge. Familiarity with common Linux commands. Should you have any question when running this workshop as a group or on your own, do not hesitate to talk to you coordinator or contact us at AWS HPC
